verse_part: for you are not My people
and I am not your God
to them, You are not My people
to them, You are the sons
For she is not my wife
and I am not her husband
against her so that she cannot
that it was I who gave
So that they will be mentioned
her for Myself in the land
on her who had not obtained
to those who were not My people
And it will be, like people
applies to you, For you have been
them, And they do not know
Therefore I am like a moth
For I will be like a lion
on you are like the light
appointed for you, When I restore
up the fire From the kneading
on him, Yet he does not know
him, Yet they have not returned
them in accordance with the proclamation
to them, for they have strayed
is theirs, for they have rebelled
but not by Me; They have appointed
for themselves, That they might be cut
it, so it is not God
them up; And they will begin
Him. Their bread will be like mourners
to Him; And they will be wanderers
with a yoke; I will harness
Yet it is I who taught
to them as one who lifts
them to the One on high
But I have been the LORD
they will be like the morning
Yet I have been the LORD
And you were not to know
That you are against Me, against your help
upon him; He is not a wise
For it is not the time
I will be like the dew
have I to do with idols
after you. I am like a luxuriant
